channel.title: Vote command?
channel.description: hi can anyone tell me how to add a vote command? and if they know how, how do i make it so every 24 they can vote and when they vote they get a reward. thank you!

item.title: Vote command?
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

You have to add the command into Commands.java not client.java.

Read full topic

ill help u ASAP.

item.title: Vote command?
item.dc:creator: @mrdrzj mrdrzj
item.description:
@mrdrzj wrote:

oh what i sent you was the reward thing
for vote command
in commands.java add this

if (playerCommand.equals("vote")) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("YOUR VOTE URL HERE", 12000); c.sendMessage("Please vote every day!");

Read full topic

item.title: Vote command?
item.dc:creator: @john1716 john1716
item.description:
@john1716 wrote:

isnt there suppose to be a place to put my vote link

Read full topic

item.title: Vote command?
item.dc:creator: @mrdrzj mrdrzj
item.description:
@mrdrzj wrote:

on your commands.java add

if (playerCommand.startsWith("ivoted")) { if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.freecashDelay < 86400000) { c.sendMessage("You can only use this command every 24 hours."); return; } if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.freecashDelay >= 86400000) { c.sendMessage("Thanks for voting, enjoy your 10M!"); c.getItems().addItem(995, 10000000); c.freecashDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); }

then on your player.java search for public long lastplayer move, and somewhere in the middle add
freecashDelay (dont forget to add a , after freecashdelay if there is none)

Read full topic
